attributes.action: Convert Chequers into a temporary NHS facility until the government has provided the facilities required by patients with mental health problems
attributes.additional_details: It is totally unacceptable that young people are kept in Police cells because the NHS has a lack of facilities for those with mental health problems.  At the same time we, the tax payers, provide the PM with 2 free houses.  This petition requires thePM to give up one of those properties for use by the NHS until the bigger problem is fixed.
